title: India's entry-level bike buyers unlikely to return soon, says Bajaj Auto MD
description: Bajaj Auto's managing director, Rajiv Bajaj, stated that the entry-level customers are unlikely to return in the near future, indicating a lackluster festive season for traditional fuel-based motorcycles as buyers consider electric alternatives. Bajaj attributed this trend to the impact of the COVID pandemic, job losses, and rising petrol prices on lower-income households.
